commit message:
Merge pull request #630 from Grunthos/master

Pre-release bug fixes

Merge pull request #51 from eleybourn/master

Merge pull request #630 from Grunthos/master

Fixes & cleanups to query string format code

- now appends '*' to words when searching via FTS
- removes all puncutation when searching Amazon

When importing book covers from an archive, set the cover date based on
original

NOTE: this has implications for 'Backup New & Changed'...such covers
(and books based on existing code) will not be included in incrementals.

We need a better incremental backup strategy; the current one is
designed around syncing, and no backup.
